edu.fgcu.secrel

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fgcu.secrel.Service
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Service>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReliableHardwareService, ReliableSoftwareService

    public abstract class Service
extends Object
implements Comparable<Service>

    This class represents a reliable service to be protected by the SecRel's role-based security system.

    Author:
    lngibson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Service.Handle
      The Handle class is a link between callers of a Service and its executing thread.
      class  Service.ReferenceMonitor
      This class is responsible for granting or denying access to a request to invoke a Service.
      class  Service.ServiceRunner
      This class executes the Service in a separate thread.

      • result

        protected static void result(Service.Handle handle,
                             InputStream result,
                             int size)
        Delegates result and size to Handle.result().
        Parameters:
        handle - the Handle of this Service
        result - the result of the Service
        size - the size of the result in bytes or -1 if it cannot be determined

      • state

                            int state)
        Delegates state to Handle.state().
        Parameters:
        handle - the Handle of this Service
        state - the state of the Service

      • invokeServiceInner

        protected abstract void invokeServiceInner(Service.Handle handle,
                                           String[] argv,
                                           Map<String,String> argm)
        Performs the action specified by this Service instance. Any results will be sent to any listeners registered to the Handle supplied.
        Parameters:
        handle - a Handle instance to communicate with this Service thread
        argv - an array of parameters
        argm - an map of parameters

      • setId

        protected void setId(int id)
        Sets the id of this Service. This method is to be called by the SecRelSystem during the registration of this Service and should only be called once. Any additional calls will trigger an IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        id - the new id of this Service

        Returns the rights associated with this service.

      • invokeService

        public Service.Handle invokeService(String[] argv,
                                    Map<String,String> argm)
        Performs the action specified by this Service instance. This function is a wrapper for the abstract method invokeServiceInner( Handle handle, InputStream stream ). This function creates a new Handle instance to pass to the invokeServiceInner and returns the created Handle.
        Parameters:
        argv - an array of parameters
        argm - an map of parameters
        Returns:
        a Handle instance to communicate with the Service thread

      • monitor

        public Service.ReferenceMonitor monitor(int userId)
        Creates a new ReferenceMonitor for this Service.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user requesting this Service
        Returns:
        the monitor authorizing the user's request
